title: How Do You Stop Bike Lanes from Being Removed? Stand in Front of the Truck – Urbanist Update
content:
A Portland bike advocacy group stood in front of trucks to prevent the city from removing bike lanes installed "by mistake" earlier this year, and more in the latest Update.

Read the full article at How Do You Stop Bike Lanes from Being Removed? Stand in Front of the Truck – Urbanist Update on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
